snippet: Quarterback Tom Brady's last best chance to avoid serving a four-game "Deflategate" suspension to start the new season was flatly rejected Wednesday by an appeals court....
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Tom Brady's last best chance to avoid serving a four-game "Deflategate" suspension to start the new season was flatly rejected Wednesday by an appeals court.

headline.main: Tom Brady's 'Deflategate' Appeal Rejected by Federal Court
headline.print_headline: Tom Brady's 'Deflategate' Appeal Rejected by Federal Court
